mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(boardNo) FROM groupboard WHERE groupNo = #{groupNo} AND (title LIKE #{keyword} OR content LIKE #{keyword})
SELECT COUNT(boardNo) FROM groupboard WHERE groupNo = #{groupNo} AND (title LIKE #{keyword})
SELECT COUNT(boardNo) FROM groupboard WHERE groupNo = #{groupNo} AND (content LIKE #{keyword})
SELECT COUNT(g.boardNo) FROM groupboard g INNER JOIN member m on g.writer = m.memberId WHERE g.groupNo = #{groupNo} AND (g.writer LIKE #{keyword} OR m.name LIKE #{keyword})
SELECT *, m.name writerName, gl.groupName groupName FROM groupboard g INNER JOIN member m ON g.writer = m.memberId INNER JOIN grouplist gl ON g.groupNo = gl.groupNo AND g.boardNo = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO groupboard (WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT, writeDate, groupNo, tags) VALUES (#{writer}, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE(), #{groupNo}, #{tags})
